Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ・マディガン…… なぜ、ヤツを止められなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva Madigan... How could I have failed to stop her...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こうなる前に、 打つ手はなかったのか……
Entry.EnglishText: Was there nothing I could have done to prevent all of this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分を責めないで、<Eugene>！ 悪いのはジルバなんだヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Stop blaming yourself, <Eugene>! Zilva was the bad guy here!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうさ！ あんたがいなけりゃ、 気づくヤツなんていなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah! If it weren't for you, no one would have realized that something was amiss.

Entry.JapaneseText: すべてが終わったわけじゃない……
Entry.EnglishText: We're not out of the woods yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバに苦しめられた人たちのためにも、 オレたちにできる事をやろう……
Entry.EnglishText: Let's do our part for the sake of those who suffered at Zilva's hand.
